title: Article 1 - Determination of Eligibility-General
content:
Article 1 - Determination of Eligibility-General

State Regulations

Part 349 - General Provisions (§ 349.1 to 349.6)

Part 350 - Application (§ 350.1 to 350.8)

Part 351 - Investigation and Eligibility (§ 351.1 to 351.14)

Part 352 - Standards of Assistance (§ 352.1 to 352.39)

Part 353 - Recovery Of Interim Assistance (§ 353.1 to 353.4)

Part 354 - Case Recording (§ 354.1 to 354.4)

Part 355 - Information Pamphlets; Notification Of Decisions (§ 355.1 to 355.5)

Part 356 - Inquiries And Complaints (§ 356.1 to 356.4)

Part 357 - Confidential Nature Of Records (§ 357.1 to 357.6)

Part 358 - Fair Hearings: Family Assistance, Safety Net Assistance, Medical Assistance, Emergency Assistance to Aged, Blind or Disabled Persons, Emergency Assistance to Needy Families With Children, Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program, Home Energy Assistance, and Services Funded through the Department of Family Assistance (Subpart 358-1 to 358-6)

Part 359 - Disqualification For Intentional Program Violation (§ 359.0 to 359.10)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
